parameters:
\N<Hojiko>So, you've changed clothes. Indeed, that outfit suits you
better, my dear wife.

Hojiko looks down at Segi, who is seated on the bed. Segi's
eyes are filled with unease, in stark contrast to the man's

\N<Hojiko>To be honest, your previous attire was stimulating and
attractive... but still, I've always wanted to enjoy it with
you in that outfit.

\N<Hojiko>Please don't look at me with those eyes. I told you there's
no hard feelings, right? Please don't think badly of me...?

shouldn't be doing this.

\N<Hojiko>But I've been waiting... In my heart, I've been waiting for
this moment.

\N<Hojiko>Right now, I'm excited... and my heart is fluttering. Just

\N<Segi>...Yes. You and she have been together for many years,
haven't you?

There's no love left in our marriage anymore.

\N<Hojiko>More than anything about her, right now, you're the one who
matters to me.

Hojiko insists that his feelings for his wife are already
gone. His eyes are not lying. They plead that Segi before
him is more important than anything else.

or losing... wasn't it?

Ryuda would want?

dances to their tune.

doing it reluctantly because it's an order from me.

tonight...

\N<Hojiko>Yes, I keep my promises. I won't do anything and will let

on!
\N<Hojiko>Ha, haha... So this is Ms. Segi's... hahaha...

lifting her clothes. The act she performed for a man who was
